name: 翁頌舜
objective: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Database Systems
2. The Database Environment
3. Database Development Process
4. Data Models
5. The Relational Database Model
6. Entity Relationship Modeling
7. Normalization of Database Tables
8. Advanced Data Modeling
9. Structured Query Language (SQL)
10. Advanced SQL
11. Database Design
scorePolicy:
1. Homework, Quiz and Project Assignment 25%
2. Class Participation and Class Attendance  15%
3. Midterm Exam 30%
4. Final Exam 30%
materials:
1. Modern Database Management, 11 Edition, 2012, Jeffrey A. Hoffer, Ramesh Venkataraman and Heikki Topi, Publisher: Prentice Hall.
2. Database Systems: Design, Implementation and Management, 10 Edition, 2013, Carlos Coronel, Steven Morris and Peter Rob, Publisher: Joe Sabatino.
